definition: snow/snowfall/CL:場|场[chang2]/to have the appearance of snow/to wipe away, off or out/to clean
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: Skiing has become very popular recently .
sentences.chinese: 滑雪運動最近盛行起來。

sentences.english: Located in southern Austria , it is a paradise for skiers.
sentences.chinese: 位於奧地利南部，它是滑雪運動愛好者的天堂。

sentences.english: The ski activities are too expensive.
Be conscious of your snowboard and your movement.
sentences.chinese: 是你和你的滑雪運動的意識。

sentences.english: She gets her kicks from windsurfing and skiing.
sentences.chinese: 她從帆板運動和滑雪運動中得到極大的樂趣。

sentences.english: Snow sports, after all, are not just a business, but a business that depends on the weather.
sentences.chinese: 畢竟，滑雪運動不只是一樁生意，它依賴天氣。
